H0.text: In art, what term is given to the technique where paint is mixed and bound with egg yolk. Emulsion

H1.text: In art, what term is given to the technique where paint is mixed and bound with egg yolk. Casein

H2.text: In art, what term is given to the technique where paint is mixed and bound with egg yolk. Gouache

H3.text: In art, what term is given to the technique where paint is mixed and bound with egg yolk. TEMPERA

A4.text: Tempera (Italian: [ˈtɛmpera]) is a permanent, fast-drying painting medium consisting of pigments mixed with a water-soluble binder medium, usually glutinous material such as egg yolk.

A5.text: Tempera paint made from the milk protein is Casein paint.
